clusters.title: Environment
clusters.neutral_headline: Australian Environment News Reports on Climate and Conservation
ai_summary: Australia faces increased bushfire risks due to climate change, impacting ecosystems.
Conservation efforts focus on protecting endangered species and their habitats.
Government initiatives address pollution and promote sustainable practices across industries.
Scientists research climate impacts on biodiversity and develop adaptation strategies.
Community groups actively participate in environmental restoration and advocacy.

clusters.title: Investigations
clusters.neutral_headline: Australian News Outlets Report on Investigative Journalism
ai_summary: Investigations reveal corruption allegations within government agencies and private sectors.
Journalists uncover financial misconduct and expose unethical business practices.
Reports detail the impact of policy decisions on vulnerable communities.
Investigations examine the effectiveness of law enforcement and judicial systems.
News outlets publish findings from long-term investigations into complex issues.

clusters.title: Relationships & Family
clusters.neutral_headline: Australian News Covers Relationships and Family Dynamics
ai_summary: Articles explore evolving family structures and changing societal norms.
Discussions address challenges faced by parents and children in modern society.
Reports examine the impact of social media on relationships and communication.
Experts offer advice on navigating relationship issues and building healthy connections.
News covers family law matters, including divorce, custody, and child support.
